title: The source code of Zeppelin Ransomware sold on a hacking forum
description: A threat actor announced the sale of the source code and a cracked version of the Zeppelin ransomware builder for $500. Researchers from cybersecurity firm KELA reported that a threat actor announced on a cybercrime forum the sale of the source code and a cracked version of the Zeppelin ransomware builder for $500. The seller clarified that it has […]

title: Russia-linked APT Sandworm was inside Ukraine telecoms giant Kyivstar for months
description: Ukrainian authorities revealed that Russia-linked APT Sandworm had been inside telecom giant Kyivstar at least since May 2023. Russia-linked APT group Sandworm was inside Ukrainian telecoms giant Kyivstar from at least May 2023, the head of Ukraine’s Security Service of Ukraine’s (SBU) told Reuters. “This attack is a big message, a big warning, not only to […]

title: Ivanti fixed a critical EPM flaw that can result in remote code execution
description: Ivanti fixed a critical vulnerability in its Endpoint Manager (EPM) solution that could lead to remote code execution (RCE) on vulnerable servers Ivanti has released security updates to address a critical vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2023-39336 (CVSS score 9.6), impacting its Endpoint Manager (EPM) solution. The exploitation of this vulnerability could lead to remote code execution […]

title: MyEstatePoint Property Search Android app leaks user passwords
description: The MyEstatePoint Property Search app leaked data on nearly half a million of its users, exposing their names and plain-text passwords, the Cybernews research team has found. The all-in-one real estate app MyEstatePoint Property Search left a publicly accessible MongoDB server containing the sensitive details of its app users. The app, developed by NJ Technologies, […]
